title: Computer freezes when Champs load in
body: My computer freezes when my league character loads in to the rift. The only time i can get this to not happen is when i ALT+TAB out of the league window, in which case league just crashes. I have tried resetting my computer to an earlier date, which didn't work; I have tried deleting league and re-installing it which didn't work; I have tried cooling my computer to keep it from overheating, which also didn't work. I was wondering how i could fix this.

replies.body:
Is your PC running Windows 10? I've heard of this happening lately for some after the Windows 10 Anniversary update rolled out and enabled the Game DVR feature by default. If so,  I recommend disabling the game bar or DVR by following [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if that helped.
this helped so much thank you! I can now feed once again! XD
